description: This restaurant boasts a pleasant terrace overlooking a small man-made lake used for water sports, as well as a simple, modern dining room with picture windows offering the same view. The minimalist style of the decor is echoed in the cuisine, which is creative with occasionally more technical twists. The desserts offer a fitting end to your meal – the interesting selection includes one striking dish featuring the unusual combination of chocolate and saffron.
